Articles.Content:
Good morning fellow airframne bashers, we are here to introduce to the market a fleet of armed atmospheric and trans-atmospheric vehicles.

First of all, behold:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

We are proud to introduce LOF-1, SSTO with a simple flight profile. It will go supersonic at relatively low levels, the canards tend to stall if not treated with respect and the agility is there at the right speed envelope.

ACTION GROUPS:

1-fire the selected weapons.

2-cycle through the weapons.

3-release countermeasures.

5-flaps down 1 notch.

6-flaps up 1 notch.

9-toggle jet engines.

0-toggle aerospike.

Mods used are: NEAR, BDarmory, retrofuture, procedural wings and the new landing gear.

.craft file here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/8nwkdw6jjk4k00x/LOF-1.craft?dl=0

NEW MODEL!! LAB-1a and 1b. Atmospheric bomber/attack aircraft, flies like a treat. Not a speed machine however, the engine combination is for better performance at all levels of flight.

ACTION GROUPS:

1-fire the selected weapons.

2-cycle through the weapons.

3-release countermeasures.

4-open bomb bay doors.

5-flaps down 1 notch.

6-flaps up 1 notch.

7-toggle airbrakes.

Careful takeoff and landing, it tends to veer to the sides, can figure out why.

.craft 1a: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2w4xpiph0cfl4ns/LAB-1a.craft?dl=0

.craft 1b https://www.dropbox.com/s/tc6k2g4lsgvb02v/LAB-1b.craft?dl=0

Please report any issues, Im open for suggestions and maybe requests.

Edited November 13, 2014 by JuanxLink
